value.title: Why AI Is Widening the Gap Between Top Talent and Everyone Else
value.content: The conventional wisdom about AI is that it will be the great equalizer, giving average employees the tools to perform like superstars.

value.title: MAICON 2025 Takeaways: Why the Future Is Human + Machine
value.content: SmarterX and Marketing AI Institute’s MAICON 2025 just wrapped, bringing 1,500 marketers and business leaders together in Cleveland, Ohio.

value.title: ChatGPT Gets More Personal. Is Society Ready for It?
value.content: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman just said that ChatGPT is about to get more personal, more human-like, and, for some, more adult.
